name: AngularJS - Sorting, Paging, Filtering
tagline: Demo page for implementing sorting, paging, filtering on table in AngularJS
body:
![Screenshot](http://s19.postimg.org/78wf8fvoz/Angular_JS_Sorting_Paging_Filtering.png)

### Authors and Contributors
This is my first demo page for implementing sorting, paging, filtering on a table using angular js.
Please feel free to download the source code.


Also do suggest any improvements or errors in code.
